title: Beijing pours cash into Belt and Road financing in global resources grab
summary: Spending on Xi Jinping’s signature overseas investment project hit a record in 2025, new research shows

title: Unexpected expenses take 10% of retirees' income, on average, research shows — many don't have enough cash on hand
summary: The typical retiree household will spend an amount equivalent to 10% of annual income on unexpected expenses, and about 40% lack the cash to cover those costs.
